reviewText:
Comes in cardboard
No menu
No subtitles
movies play one after the other
Similar to a crappy VHS, only thinner
I love all three of these movies. But when you buy this set of three-in-one be aware there are no English subtitles.  If you speak Hindi this is a wonderful movie only value pack.

I love Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi it is one of my all time favorite movies so when I saw it as a 3 movie pack I was excited however there are no english subtitiles.  No subtitles at all!  This would be great if I spoke Hindi!
